entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
